name: Brigandine
text: 2 @armour@

name: Buckler
text: 1 @armour@. This can be used even if you have a @2H:two-handed@ weapon.

name: Gambeson
text: 1 @armour@

name: Greaves
text: 1 @armour@

name: Helmet
text: 1 @armour@, -1 vigilance

name: Maille
text: 3 @armour@

name: Shield
text: 3 @armour@

name: Tower shield
text: +3, 4 @armour@

name: Bait
text: Take +10 to make an animal do what you want. Comes in vegetarian, meat, and bug versions.

name: Blanket
text: When you check to jump through a fire, on success you may instead use this to extinguish it.

name: Boots
text: -3 stealth, +3 vs fire and other environmental hazards.

name: Caltrops
text: Can be laid for a trap inflicting @bleeding@ and -5 athletics ueoc.

name: Citronella oil
text: Dogs and bugs hate this.

name: Fishing rod
text: By a body of water with fish, you may sacrifice a unit of bug or meat bait and check END+vig vs 12; on a pass, after 2 hours, you get a fish worth a day's supplies.

name: Lamp
text: Provides bright light within 2m and dim within 2m more. Oil not included, but not tracked.

name: Lockpick
text: +5 to pick locks.

name: Matches
text: Start a POW=1 fire.

name: Medical kit
text: +5 to checks to resolve conditions. Includes bandages, alcohol, scissors, tweezers.

name: Oil
text: Lubricate a door to prevent it blowing a stealth check.

name: Pitons
text: With a hammer, take +5 to climb checks.

name: Provisions
text: Enough food for a day. If you don't eat, take 1 @Injury@ and you don't heal @Injury@ until the next day when you eat.

name: Rope
text: 10m of hemp rope. Indicative uses are to safely climb up or down from a ledge, provided you can tie it off; tie someone up; to make a leash for an animal; to make a lasso (weapon with net ranged +1); to make a snare trap.

name: Soft shoes
text: -3 athletics, +3 stealth.

name: Arrow
text: Fired from a bow.

name: Blast pod
text: Treat as a grenade inflicting Stunned with a TN of 15.

name: Bodkin arrow
text: An armour-piercing arrow.

name: Crossbow
text: +2. No, I'm not going to design separate crossbow bolts that do the exact same thing as arrows.

name: Crowbar
text: +3. Can be used to open locked doors quickly.

name: Firelace pod
text: Treat as a grenade creating a fire with POW=8 at the target's location. If you hit a target with this, they are damaged by the fire; anyone else in the area effect checks to jump out of the way.

name: Grenade
text: Has an associated condition, such as tangled (as for glue), fire, or poison. You may target open space (if not intercepted) and automatically hit, or attack someone and clash as normal. If you engage and hit a specific target, they take the condition automatically and do not lose focus from being hit; and if you succeed in the clash or target open space, aeor everyone within a 2m radius of the target checks END+ath vs POW, and takes the condition on a fail.

name: Longsword
text: +4. If your off hand is free, take an additional +1.

name: Main gauche
text: +2. May be equipped in the off hand, giving only +1.

name: Rock
text: +1. May be treated as @consumed@, but one typically doesn't run out of rocks.

name: Sling
text: +2. @Loaded rock@, although that's probably not worth tracking.
